name: Dendritic excitations govern back-propagation via a spike-rate accelerometer
citation: Park, Pojeong (2024) Dendritic excitations govern back-propagation via a spike-rate accelerometer (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001266/draft
description: Dendritic voltage imaging was performed in hippocampal brain slices. V-Optopatch (CAG::LR-Voltron2-p2a-LR-CheRiff-eYFP; Addgene #203228) was expressed via in utero electroporation. Voltage imaging was made using JFx608 HTL dye and a one-photon microscope.
